Title: Gotham Men's Silver-Tone Double Cover Exhibition Mechanical Pocket Watch # GW...
Description: Gotham Men's Silver-Tone Double Cover Exhibition Mechanical Pocket Watch # GWC18802S FEATURES Classic round silver-tone 17 jewel mechanical double cover pocket watch suitable for engraving Intricately designed front and back covers that both open to expose movement Scratch resistant front and back mineral crystals Includes 15" steel curb pocket watch chain with deluxe lobster claw end piece Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions DESCRIPTION This classic and elegant silver-tone exhibition pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a precision 17 jewel mechanical movement showcased in full view when the front and back case covers are opened showing all moving parts, highly polished intricately designed silver-tone case and scratch resistant mineral crystals to protect your timepiece. In addition, this double cover skeleton pocket watch includes a deluxe 15 inch steel curb chain that can attach to your belt loop. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy.
